Severity Level: {'Mild': 'Often asymptomatic; may cause occasional headaches.', 'Moderate to Severe': 'Can lead to heart disease, stroke, kidney damage.'}

Recovery Time: Chronic Condition: Requires ongoing management to prevent complications.

Recovery Time: Chronic Condition: Requires lifelong management to prevent complications.
